Uses of Interface
net.sourceforge.pbeans.data.Database

Packages that use Database
net.sourceforge.pbeans.data Database abstraction package. 
 

Uses of Database in net.sourceforge.pbeans.data
 

Classes in net.sourceforge.pbeans.data that implement Database
 class AbstractDatabase
          Base implementation of Database.
 class GenericDatabase
          A database abstraction for an RDBMS unknown to DefaultDatabaseFactory.
 class MySQLDatabase
          An abstraction for the MySQL database.
 class SQLServerDatabase
          An abstraction for the SQL Server database.
 

Methods in net.sourceforge.pbeans.data that return Database
 Database DefaultDatabaseFactory.getDatabase(javax.sql.DataSource store)
          Implements the DatabaseFactory interface.
 Database DatabaseFactory.getDatabase(javax.sql.DataSource store)
          Should build a proper Database implementation depending on the underlying RDBMS given by store.
